mapper.select: select a.USER_ID, ACCT_ID, BALANCE, ACCT_TYPE, ACCT_STATUS, BANK_NO, CVN2, PHONE, b.Name, CERTIFICATE_CODE, EXPIRE_DATE, CARD_TYPE, BANK_TYPE, PRIORITY, VALID_FLAG, c.PASSWORD, UPDATE_TIME from ACT_D_ACCOUNT a, ACT_D_BANKCARD b, ACT_D_PAY_PASSWORD c where a.ACCT_TYPE = '2' and a.user_id = b.user_id(+) and a.user_id = c.user_id(+) and a.user_id = '${user_id}'
